title: Splintered: Sierra's Legacy
description: Born to save a dying Planet, Sierra must first find herself. A foundling at birth, unaware of her heritage, she must learn to use her magic and find the answer to save their worlds from destruction. It will take three of three worlds to hold the magic. Who will it be, and how can she, a girl on her own find the answer and fullfill her own destiny in return. Can she live up to the legacy she was born for?
author: L.A. Wright
